dict.string:
Fixes the iOS 9 reload issue of pages stealing focus from the URL search bar. This issue usually occurs after you've just opened Safari.
⚠️IMPORTANT NOTE: Conflicts with the tweak "SafariFix" so uninstall it before using this patch. This should do the same & doesn't have the missing cancel/reload icons bug.
[v.1] Only tested with an iP5 9.0.2. Made as a request via r/jailbreak. (3-11-16)
☞PayPal: goin730@gmail.com
Safari Search Bar Reload Fix ₃₋₁₁₋₁₆
